entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
